name: Apocalypse with Friends
description:
This is my first game jam so i hope you like it.

Solo project

Controls in main menu and on pause menu

If you like it, may get a post-jam patch

TIP:

The more zombies you hit with a single sword, the more points you get!

Everything made myself during the jam, with the exception of SFX.

Voice generator here: https://lingojam.com/RobotVoiceGenerator

Music coming soon on streaming services, you can also listen on youtube:
